txt.en: Type '/stuck' + 'Enter' or '/unstuck' + 'Enter' to free your character from a stuck location.
In the Options panel you can enable skill target forwarding to use appropriate skills on your target's target.
Visit the forums at www.lotro.com to keep up on the latest news updates, game information, and community discussions.
You can disable rain or snow by toggling precipitation effects in the Options panel.
The 'H' key will pin the tooltip you are currently viewing. You can pin multiple tooltips at once, which can be useful for tracking and quickly selecting foes or friends.
'F12' will hide all User Interface elements.
Showing your selection's target vitals can be used for targeting and can be useful when skill target forwarding is enabled. Enable it in the Options panel.
In the Options panel you can enable an assist window that displays targets specified by the fellowship leader (CTRL-O).
Use the HELP option on the System menu to access FAQs, request support, or file a bug (F7).
There are many exclusive items available from the LOTRO Store.
Check the LOTRO Store for weekly sales on specific items.
Use 'Alt+F10' to toggle your lantern while outside at night.
Many crafting recipes permit you to create different versions of an item from the same recipe.
Visit Lalia's Market near the Boar Fountain in Bree to purchase select cosmetic clothing items and sets.
Press 'Shift' + 'C' to bring up the Collections Panel. See what Mounts, Cosmetic Pets, and Emotes you have and have yet to collect!
Featured Instances offer extra rewards for playing the scaling instance of the week. Look for it at the top of the instance join (Ctrl-J).
You may own a standard house and also any number of premium houses. Each Kinship, however, may only have a single Kinship house.
'Alt + F' will open a find items dialog. You can use it to search for a full or partial item name in all open storage panels (inventory, vault, shared storage, etc).
Talk to a housing broker at Bree's Boar Fountain, in Dol Amroth, or in Minas Tirith to visit a premium housing neighbourhood on the Cape of Belfalas in Gondor.
'/raid locks' will list all raids or instance chests currently locked for your character along with reset time information.
Lockboxes contain gear, cosmetics, and other useful items. Get keys from the LOTRO Store to open them.
You can control in-game voice chat volume for any fellowship member individually by clicking on the audio icon on their fellowship vital to display a volume slider.
'Ctrl' + '\' will allow you to move your vitals and other user interfaces on the screen.
'/ui layout save' will allow you to save your current ui layout to a file on your computer. Use '/ui layout load' to restore a layout or load it on another computer.
In a Raid, the Social panel can be used to configure which vitals you want to see.
Press 'Ctrl' + 'T' or use inventory toggle lock mode to enable or disable the sell lock status of an item in your inventory.
Owning a house in a Neighbourhood gives you a discount to the vendors there. Remember to buy local!
Want to let your friends into your house? You can manage Permissions from the House tab of the Character Journal.
Press 'Enter' or '/' to type in the chat window.
Don't forget to maintain your house. Pay upkeep by the week or a couple in advance from the House panel.
The default movement mode is running. Press 'Insert' to toggle between running and walking modes.
Mark enemies more quickly! You can now bind the fellowship target marking commands to any key.
Vault-keepers grant access to your bank, where you can store up to 30 items. Additional storage space can also be purchased.
Visit the Quest Grouping tab on the Social Panel (O) to find other players who want to group up for a specific quest.
You can modify the volume of player generated music in the Option Panel (Ctrl-O).
You can toggle floating player, NPC, and item names by pressing the 'N' key.
You can change all tooltips to be mouse relative by modifying your Options (Ctrl-O).
You can disable involuntary emotes in the Options panel (Ctrl-O).
You can toggle off visual notification for combat responses as an option in the Options Panel (Ctrl-O).
The Quests/Deeds Tracker allows you to display the current objectives of up to five quests or deeds at any given time.
There is an option to view the vitals of your Target's Target in the Option Panel (Ctrl-O).
There is an option to display your skill queue in the Options Panel (Ctrl-O).
Press 'Shift + L' to display the Deed Log, where you can view completed deeds and the rewards that you can receive.
Press the 'Num Lock' key to toggle autorun ON or OFF.
In most instances, you will find an option to leave an Instance by right clicking on your portrait.
You can drag and drop items into the Auction 'Item Name' field to populate it with the name for searches.
Enable the 'Always Loot All' option in 'UI Settings' to automatically take the contents of containers you open.
Enable combat state break notices in 'Combat Options' to see who is breaking roots or dazes.
Skirmishes, an instance type unlockable at Level 20, scale to your level and group size.

Key Mapping in the Options panel will allow you to reset default key mappings and bind common actions to your favorite key. Dismount / Remount, select next item, follow selection, and the /music system notes are some favourites.
Ctrl-J opens your Instance Finder panel and allows you to join dungeon instances and Skirmishes from anywhere in the world.
'Alt' + 'R' will open the Filter Panel, allowing you to filter out unwanted loot, quests or sounds.
Control chat window opacity and the sizes and colors of different types of chat text in the Options Panel - Chat tab.
The Fire damage-type is especially strong against Creatures of Nature and Troll-kind.
The Light damage-type is especially strong against Troll-kind and the Unseen.
'Ctrl + left-click' any item in inventory, on a vendor, or linked in chat to try it on in the Dressing Room.
The Ancient Dwarf damage-type is especially strong against Dragon-kind.
The Beleriand damage-type is especially strong against Spiders & Insects and Ancient Evil.
The Westernesse damage-type is especially strong against the Dead and the Unseen.
You can change the hover-over delay until a tooltip appears in the Options Menu (Ctrl-O).
Resistances increase your chances of avoiding certain harmful effects.
Additional Shared Storage slots can be unlocked on the LOTRO Store.
Deeds that are advanced by using offensive skills do not advance when used on trivial difficulty (grey) monsters.
Your characters have access to a Wardrobe that allows them to cosmetically share clothing and armour.
Keep up with the latest in Middle-earth fashion. You can use the outfit system to customize your look.
98 Additional Wardrobe slots can be unlocked from the LOTRO Store.
You can bind a key to an outfit allowing you to switch cosmetic outfits instantly.
You can enable or disable the ability to fire ranged weapons while running via the Combat Options menu in the Options Panel (Ctrl-O)
Right-click on a ring in the quest tracker and pick 'Find Others On Quest' to help find people working on that quest.
You can use 'Ctrl' + 'right-click' on almost any item icon in the game to create an examination link for the chat window.
You can preview dye colours on clothing in the Dressing Room UI.
